title: New: Henry Jamison – Dallas Love Field
body:
**Henry Jamison** has quickly become one of my favourite new artists of the year.

Having already clocked up well in excess of a million plays on Spotify alone, it’s clear that his wholesome songwriting is striking a chord with more than just me. His third offering, _Dallas Love Field_, has more than a touch of Conor Oberst to it – and that’s meant entirely as a compliment. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
